reviews.review_msg: FREN 201 is an online course and all the content is in online modules that he didn't make (department's choice though, not his) so there isn't really much teaching from the prof. However the course was piss easy and Giuliano Gullotti is a nice prof, very laid-back and approachable. Easy A, take it, learn a bit, move on.

Giuliano was such a pleasure to have as a professor. He's sweet, kind and accepting of everyone's opinions during discussions. I can't comment on his criteria and grading as it was obvious that Giuliano had to follow a certain curriculum considering he's a new professor and expected to do so. Not his fault. All in all, un prof chill.
